channel.title: CVE Feed for Dominion Voting Systems -- ImageCast X application
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dominion Voting Systems -- ImageCast X application

item.title: CVE-2022-1742|2024-09-17T01:00:30.677Z -- dominion%20voting%20systems -- imagecast%20x%20application
item.description: The tested version of Dominion Voting Systems ImageCast X allows for rebooting into Android Safe Mode, which allows an attacker to directly access the operating system. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges on a device and/or install malicious code.
